title: Kartoffelgratin
ingredients: 3 tbsp grated cheese (e.g., Parmesan or Pecorino)
instructions: 1. Peel the potatoes and slice them into approx. 2 mm thin slices. 2. Mix the milk and cream, add the finely chopped or pressed garlic, some salt and pepper, and rosemary. Gently bring to a simmer with the potato slices and let simmer for about 10 minutes while carefully stirring. 3. Grease a baking dish with butter, fill with the potato mixture, and sprinkle with cheese. 4. Bake in a preheated oven at 220 Â°C (upper/lower heat) for about 15 - 20 minutes on the middle rack.
